content.question: Some scholars have theorized that the design of the Great Serpent Mound is linked to astronomical phenomena because of the

choices.label: close resemblance of its shape to the constellation Orion
nearby presence of grave steles depicting the sun and moon
proximity of other effigy mounds, which represent celestial deities
orientation of its head, which is aligned with the summer solstice

content.answer: orientation of its head, which is aligned with the summer solstice
